casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
SMITH S236112 Supreme Court of California September 14, 2016 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Werdegar, Chin, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

*280The petition for review is granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition of a related issue in People v. Gonzales, S231171 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court. Corrigan, J., was absent and did not participate.
